text: Ve (В, в) is the third letter of the Cyrillic alphabet. It is said as [v]. It comes from the Greek beta, along with the Cyrillic beh. Its old name was vede. Although it looks like a B, it stands for the Roman V and Beh (Б, б) stands for B. See also: Voiced postalveolar lateral fricative ==Related pages== * V * Beta (letter)
title: Ve (Cyrillic)
